name: The Point CAFE & GRILL
address: 402 Hunts Point Ave, Bronx, NY 10474, USA

reviews.text: Please don’t ever come here. I ordered a bacon, egg and cheese a New York Staple This is gotta be the worst bacon, egg, and cheese sandwich I have ever had. It looks like a half of one egg a strip of bacon Between two slices of bread, shaking my head
Good coffee, Good food.  I thought everything was very reasonably priced.  Owner seemed like a good guy.
M-f I get a sausage egg and cheese on a raisin bagel with avocado.
Fast in the morning it’s by warehouses so makes sense, good food and cheap. If you keep it simple. In the cold morning how can you go wrong with a tea and egg sandwich
$17.75 for a Philly cheese steak with a bottle of soda....straight robbery.
